Uses of Interface
org.cojen.maker.Field

  • Uses of Field in org.cojen.maker

    Methods in org.cojen.maker that return Field
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Field
    MethodMaker.access​(VarHandle handle, Object... values)
    Access a VarHandle via a pseudo field.
    Field
    MethodMaker.field​(String name)
    Access a static or instance field in the enclosing object of this method.
    Field
    Variable.field​(String name)
    Access a static or instance field from the object referred to by this variable.
    default Field
    Field.name​(String name)
    Fields cannot be renamed, and so this method always throws an IllegalStateException.
    Field
    Field.set​(Object value)
    Assign a value to this variable, either from another variable or from a constant.
